Uses of Package
org.teamfarce.mirch

  • Packages that use org.teamfarce.mirch 
    Package Description
    org.teamfarce.mirch  
    org.teamfarce.mirch.dialogue  
  • Classes in org.teamfarce.mirch used by org.teamfarce.mirch 
    Class and Description
    Clue
    Stores information about a single clue.
    DisplayController
    The display controller controls the drawing of all items/objects/GUI elements to the display.
    DisplayMap
    Displays the map on the screen.
    Door.Face 
    GameSnapshot
    Stores a snapshot of the game state.
    GameState
    Represents different states in the game.
    GUIController
    Generates and controlls all GUI elements in the Game.
    InputController
    The input controller deals with all mouse and keyboard inputs, converting them to meaningful commands for use by the render function.
    InterviewGUIController
    The Interview GUI controller controls the Interview/Questioning system
    Journal
    The Journal stores relevant information to the players progress through the game.
    JournalGUIController
    The journal GUI controller draws the Journal GUI to the screen and handles any inputs whilst the journal is displayed
    MapEntity
    Base class to represent different map entities.
    Prop
    Creates an individual prop entity, extends from the MapEntity class.
    RenderItem
    The RenderItem class is used by the front end to link a front-end sprite with its back end Object.
    Room
    Represents a room in the map.
    ScenarioBuilder.CharacterData 
    ScenarioBuilder.ConstructPropsResult 
    ScenarioBuilder.CreateAdderResult 
    ScenarioBuilder.ScenarioBuilderException 
    ScenarioBuilderDatabase

    ScenarioBuilderDatabase.DataProp 
    ScenarioBuilderDatabase.DataProtoprop 
    ScenarioBuilderDatabase.DataQuestionAndResponse 
    ScenarioBuilderDatabase.DataQuestioningIntention 
    ScenarioBuilderDatabase.DataQuestioningStyle 
    ScenarioBuilderDatabase.DataResource 
    ScenarioBuilderDatabase.DataRoomTemplate 
    ScenarioBuilderDatabase.DataRoomType 
    Suspect
    Stores information about a single suspect character.
